title: SAVE THE DATE: Celebrate 10 Years With Us on Oct 16

replies.body: Just give each individual active account a special something for playing the game. I personally feel like this is very unfair for people that cant watch the stream and only certain people will win stuff and not everyone that has helped make this game what it is today.
Exactly. I won't be able to watch the stream but would appreciate the giveaway.
Yeah, like at least have some consideration for those who cant watch it.

Exactly, give like a champion capsule or some anniversary capsule to all players for playing the game. Some of us aren't able to catch these streams. Sucks to have played this game for a while and our 'reward' is a simple twitch stream giveaway.

You'll get a bunch of free stuff even if you missed the stream (like I did). 

>    During 10 Days of Gifting (from 10/17–10/27) you can play a game to receive a daily gift, culminating in a very special surprise on League’s birthday. Don't worry if you miss a day, they'll last for a little while. See the gifts below.
___
> ### *Day 1: Anniversary Icon, Emote, and Ward Skin[](https://.)        Day 2: 6300 Blue Essence[](https://.)        Day 3: Masterwork Chest + Hextech Key[](https://.)        Day 4: Little Legends Rare Egg[](https://.)        Day 5: 3000 Orange Essence[](https://.)        Day 6: 4 Skin Shards[](https://.)        Day 7: 25 Prestige Points[](https://.)        Day 8: 200 Worlds 2019 Tokens[](https://.)        Day 9: 2 Gemstones[](https://.)        Day 10: Legendary Skin[](https://.)        Day 11: Annie-versary + Birthday Border + Icon *

Wait, you don't want to quit your day job so you can commit more hours to League?

Never seem to find out about these events until after the fact, how about a few weeks notice Riot in the game client itself. Or maybe they do and I'm just blind lol
There was a weeks notice for the 10th-anniversary event and the times of the stream, though for obvious reasons not much in the way of other specifics.

I expected more...
Urf would have been fine

#We are getting URF!

https://youtu.be/xtEDtjhsAXA?t=128?noredirect

>After years the URF with champion select will be headed back to live servers from October 28th - November 8th!

___
___

#**_*~~ALSO FOR LEAGUE:~~*_**
___
___
#10 Days of Free Stuff!

>    During 10 Days of Gifting (from 10/17–10/27) you can play a game to receive a daily gift, culminating in a very special surprise on League’s birthday. Don't worry if you miss a day, they'll last for a little while. See the gifts below.
___
> ### *Day 1: Anniversary Icon, Emote, and Ward Skin[](https://.)        Day 2: 6300 Blue Essence[](https://.)        Day 3: Masterwork Chest + Hextech Key[](https://.)        Day 4: Little Legends Rare Egg[](https://.)        Day 5: 3000 Orange Essence[](https://.)        Day 6: 4 Skin Shards[](https://.)        Day 7: 25 Prestige Points[](https://.)        Day 8: 200 Worlds 2019 Tokens[](https://.)        Day 9: 2 Gemstones[](https://.)        Day 10: Legendary Skin[](https://.)        Day 11: Annie-versary + Birthday Border + Icon *
___

#A New Marksman Support!

> ### *https://youtu.be/ZjvDFvzfxsQ?noredirect*

___
# Massive Preseason Changes!
https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/preseason-2020-gameplay-rise-elements

>GOAL: Every game, Summoner's Rift presents a variety of distinct and memorable environments for players to master.

>Rise of the Elements will bring SR to life as the primal magic of the Elemental Drakes changes the landscape each game. The third drake transforms the Rift before it spawns and after that, its element will be the only one to spawn for the remainder of the game.

___

#Dawnbringer Karma!

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-omq8PpT-VBs/Xaao4Vge71I/AAAAAAABZsw/lxFuH4c5U0UheeV4bep0JXyPlHaVmjIhwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/dawnbringer.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_skJYzAokRY/XaaqIZXOY9I/AAAAAAABZtA/35KZ9DiB9ggEYjJCqYddmc9lAxvylxNngCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Impact%2BFund_DawnbringerKarma.png

>Dawnbringer Karma will be the first LoL skin in which all proceeds will go to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund (See Below).

___
#League coming to Mobile and Console (Wild Rift)!
https://wildrift.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/

>League of Legends: Wild Rift, a redesigned 5v5 League of Legends MOBA, is coming to iOS, Android, and console. Wild Rift isn’t a League PC port—it’s been rebuilt from the ground up and designed specifically for new platforms.

>We’re going to begin the process of rolling alphas and betas through the end of 2019r. The plan is to have the mobile version fully live everywhere in the world by the end of 2020, with console coming sometime after. More info coming soon™!

___
#Arabic Language Support!

(Not super relevant to us but still neat!)

___
___

#_***~~AND THE OTHER STUFF!:~~***_
___
___
#Teamfight Tactics coming to Mobile + Rise of the Elements!

https://teamfighttactics.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/

>Keeping with the theme, Teamfight Tactics announced Set 2, “Rise of the Elements” which introduces new origins, classes, and champions (and updates a few current ones). Set 2 hits the Public Beta Environment on October 22. But that’s not all... 

>Teamfight Tactics is going mobile! The standalone app will feature cross-platform play, so you can battle for the Convergence against your friends on PC from the palm of your hand. 

___

#Social Impact Fund!
https://www.riotgames.com/en/news/riot-games-social-impact-fund

>Riot is proud to announce the formation of The Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a non-profit engine to power continued global social impact. Riot’s Karma program has already donated more than $4 million to charities around the world, including many charitable causes selected by LoL players.

___
#Legends of Runeterra!
https://playruneterra.com/en-us/

>Legends of Runeterra (LoR) is a free-to-play strategy card game set in the world of LoL. LoR features cards based on the iconic champions of LoL, as well as new characters and allies hailing from the regions of Runeterra, each with their own style and strategic advantage. LoR’s gameplay is built around dynamic, alternating combat that demands players use their skill, creativity, and cleverness to succeed. LoR offers players multiple options to acquire cards, including both robust free-to-play options and the ability to directly purchase any card with either earned or paid currency.

>LoR will be fully launched in 2020 for PC and mobile and is now open for pre-registration (some people are already playing!).

___

#Arcane!
A new animated series set in Piltover!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IA-v_LB3Qpc?noredirect

___

#9 New Soundtrack Albums!

https://open.spotify.com/artist/47mIJdHORyRerp4os813jD?si=bA3KEG_9TZ68sJNOj9DIvg

(Available now on Spotify, coming to others soon)
___

#Project A!
https://www.riotgames.com/en/project-a

>Riot Games is developing a stylish, competitive, character-based tactical shooter for PC, temporarily codenamed Project A. The game is set on a beautiful near-future Earth and has a lethal cast of characters, each with unique abilities that create tactical opportunities for their gunplay to shine. More information to be revealed in 2020.

___

#Project L!
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wl1UARcFjk4/XabLsLJAwYI/AAAAAAABZyk/8Vi-p4AFCrks4k6IIAONCCQSbeo2HAJDwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/PROJECTL2.jpg

>Project L is a temporary codename for a fighting game set in the LoL Universe. The game is in early stage development, and no additional details are available at this time

___
#Project F!
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T_r1ZmUj9IM/XabKSBAp9HI/AAAAAAABZyU/_B02qenG6_gUNppHws098Q5LDbc-SPhXwCLcBGAsYHQ/s640/projectf.jpg

>Project F is a temporary codename for a very early development project that explores the possibilities of traversing the world of Runeterra with your friends.

___

#League of Legends: Origins!
https://youtu.be/AkyG2q2PAPo?noredirect

>League of Legends Origins is a feature-length documentary by Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Leslie Iwerks. In it, Iwerks explores the rise of LoL and the community that made LoL one of the most-played PC games in history and fastest growing sports in the world.

___
#League of Legends Esports Manager!
https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2019/10/introducing-lol-esports-manager/

>Today we are excited to announce LoL Esports Manager, a new game that puts you in the role of a team manager leading a top-tier professional League of Legends team. First launching for the LPL in 2020, LoL Esports Manager will provide players with the full experience of what it takes to run an esports team through major decisions that include: strategy selection, pre-match bans and picks, and winning the off-season by building the best team possible.

___
___

Surely somewhere in all of that there's something for you!

[(Credit to Surrender@20 for consolodating all the info, images, and the press kit info)](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2019/10/riot-pls-10th-anniversary-edition-senna.html)
I'd really like to see URF back rather than ARURF, the latter is often too broken for one team to be fun for all playing.

Good news, that's what we're getting!

https://youtu.be/xtEDtjhsAXA?t=128
Shut up and take my money.
